text:
Lokasi hotel cukup strategis, Public area dan kamarnya bersih dan nyaman.
Staff Kantor Depan, Restaurant dan Housekeeping serta Securitynya ramah.
Untuk makanan dan minuman masih sangat terjangkau baik reguler menu maupun paketnya.
NAMUN....
Untuk area smoking di Tebu Lounge tepat di depan hotel, terkadang bau limbah yang sangat menyekat  selalu tercium di seluruh area ini.
Semoga management dapat memikirkan kembali dampaknya bagi kenyamanan dan kesehatan tamu juga staffnya.
Di beberapa bagian hotel bahkan di lobby masih banyak nyamuk dan menggangu kenyamanan.
Bagi anda yang hendak drop atau jemput tamu, siapkan uang parkir karena biaya keluar masuk tetap di tagihkan walaupun anda hanya menjemput atau mengantarkan tamu ke lobby dengan taxi atau kendaraan pribadi.
Semoga ke depannya hal ini tidak perlu di berlakukan.
Apabila anda menginap lebih dari sehari dan membawa kendaraan sendiri, mintalah akses keluar masuk di reception agar tidak di pungut biaya saat keluar masuk kendaraan anda.
Overall...rating 4 dari 5 poin di Tripadvisor berhak di berikan.
Good Job Sentral Cawang 👍

text:
Huff...PSBB Jakarta memasuki masa transisi lagi. Artinya kita boleh keluar sejenak tapi dengan protokol kesehatan yang ketat. Aku sendiri memilih untuk tetep stay tapi bukan di rumah, melainkan di hotel. Pilihanku jatuh pada Hotel Ibis Jakarta Sentral Cawang.

Udah lama banget pengen nginep di sini. Sebelum nginep tanya2 dulu soal protokol kesehatan nya, breakfastnya, poolnya dan kamarnya. Apakah semua clean atau enggak. Dan...semua CLEAN dooong.

Jadi sebelum masuk lobby diukur suhu dan cuci tangan. Waktu check-in antrinya jaga jarak dan ada hand sanitaizer di meja. Pertama kali disapa oleh Pak Liberty. Pas ngasih kunci kamar dilayani oleh Mba Vesati dan Mba Nurul. Semuanya ramaaaaaahh dan ceriaaaa. 😘

Breakfast sdh di resto tapi dgn ala carte. Menunya juarak apalagi susu jahenya. Di resto aku dilayani dengan prima oleh Pak Leon. Kursi ditata dengan berjarak. Poolnya sudah bisa digunakan tapi waktu aku kesana sepi sih.

Overall aku betah staycation di Ibis Jakarta Sentral Cawang. Next mau kesini lagi ajak keluarga. Terimakasih Ibis Sentral Cawang Jakarta atas keramahan dan keceriaannya.
title: SANTUY SEJENAK DI MASA TRANSISI

Sterilisasi cairan kami sediakan di beberapa titik, seluruh karyawan menggunakan sarung tangan dan masker dan tindakan pencegahan lainnya.

Semoga keadaan ini cepat berlalu dan berangsur pulih. dan tak lupa kami ucapkan terima kasih atas kredit yang telah diberikan kepada staff kami Nurul.

Tinggal di Ibis cawang selama 4 hari (June 23-27) , dan saya mendapatkan room #527 yang langsung menghadap ke kolam renang.

overall sangat baik dan lokasi yang tepat apabila ada urusan di sekitar Cawang.

text: Hotel Ibis Cawang Jakarta adalah sebuah hotel dengan konsep modern retro, dengan fasilitas lengkap wifi disemua lantai, Ibis Kitchen restaurant dengan menu lengkap, makan pagi full menu asia dan barat, spa, kolam renang, La Carte Lounge dan 24 service room dengan harga yang murah di kantong. title: Lengkap dah....

text:
First impression hotelnya bagus, proses check in cepat namun sayang pas sampai kamar kuncinya ga bisa buka. So harus turun lagi untuk make sure kunci benar benar bisa digunakan. Lucky for me I got pool view, kamar tidak terlalu luas namun fasilitas didalam lengkap dan desain kamar mandi pun unik, simple namun berkelas. Amazing !!!
Menu sarapan komplit, jempol buat sotonya enak banget. 
Sayangnya belum bisa gunakan kolam renang karena harus diburu waktu, next time pasti kesini lagi.
Dari 1 - 10 I give 8.5 for everything
Thank you and keep it up !

text:
Hotel dengan harga terjangkau dan lokasi yang sangat strategis. Pelayanan staff sangat helpfull dan ramah sekali. Hospitality nya berasa datang dari hati. 

Ukuran kamarnya sangat pas. Terdapat berbagai tempat untuk menyimpan barang bawaan. Fasilitas kamar mulai dari kulkas, coffee and tea maker, safe deposit box, open wardrobe, slippers, siap digunakan oleh para tamu. Banyak sekali colokan listrik diberbagai sudut ruangan. 

Bedding sangat nyaman karena menggunakan sweet bed yang menjadi standar ibis. Terdapat guling dan extra pillow. Channel TV sangat beragam dan gambarnya jernih. Wifi sangat cepat. 

Kamar mandi sangat unik berbentuk kapsul dengan amenities yang sangat komplit. Air panas sangat deras dan konsisten. 

Tersedia kolam renang, dengan ukuran Olympic size dan green area. Parkir sangat luas.  

Sarapan bervariasi, dan rasanya enak enak. Makanan selalu diisi, sehingga semua tamu tidak akan kehabisan makanan, terimakasih Ibis Jakarta Sentral Cawang untuk Pelayanan nya. Pasti kembali kalo ke jakarta.

text:
Benar-benar sangat mengesankan saat menginap di Ibis Jakarta Cawang.
Lokasi yang mudah di akses baik dengan kendaraan pribadi atau dengan transportasi umum. Untuk urusan bisnis di daerah Jakarta Timur menginap di Ibis Jakarta Cawang memang pilihan paling tepat. Proses check in yang cepat, staf resepsionis yang sangat ramah dan sangat membantu.
Kamar dengan design yang modern, kasur dengan kwalitas standard internasional yang sangat empuk, terdapat guling sebagai nilai tambah dari hotel ini. Aku dapat kamar dengan pemandangan menghadap kolam renang. Bentuk kamar mandi yang unik dan terdapat hairdryer yang sangat bermanfaat sebagai pengering rambut.
Untuk menu sarapan sangat bervariatif, dan saat Aku memesan makanan melalui room service tanggapan dari bagian restoran sangat cepat.
Grilled Lamb Rack yang aku pesan rasanya benar-benar sangat lezat.
Hotel ini pantas untuk direkomendasikan dan Aku pasti akan memilih untuk menginap di Hotel Ibis Jakarta Cawang ketika ada urusan bisnis di daerah Jakarta Timur di lain waktu.

text:
Beberapa kali menginap disini karena pekerjaan di lokasi perbatasan Jakarta, Bogor dan Depok. Selain lokasinya juga tidak jauh dari Bandara Halim Perdanakusuma. Awalnya saya menganggap pilihan menginap di hotel ini hanya cocok untuk transit, tidak untuk lebih dari dua hari. Tetapi setelah saya menginap, kekhawatiran rekan saya yang mengatakan kamarnya yang sempit tidak dirasakan bagi saya. Meski kamar mandinya memang compact, tetapi wastafelnya masih di dalam kamar mandi. Meja kerja menghadap jendela dengan pemandangan kolam renang dan padatnya jalanan di Jakarta. Penerangan yang sangat memadai, cocok sekali untuk pebisnis yang perlu banyak bekerja dengab laptop saat di kamar. 
Pilihan makanan saat sarapan cukup variatif. Restorannya juga tidak sepi pengunjung, saya pernah mencoba dine-in dan room service untuk pastanya. Dan rasanya enak sekali.
Waktu check-in dan check-out sangat efisien, akses internet juga cepat... untuk transportasi, selain transportasi umum seperti bis kota yang melewati hotel, akses taksi juga mudah.

text:
saya pesan kamar melalui telepon. Dan resepsionis memberikan pilihan kamar yang smooking room atau tidak, dan saya minta yang tidak dengan ranjang double. Resepsionis pun mengiyakan. Waktu saya datang, ternyata kamar yang non smooking dibilangnya sudah tidak ada, tinggal yg smooking room. Karena saya datang sudah larut malam dan saya sudah pusing sekali, mau tidak mau saya terpaksa menerima karena atasan saya juga menginap di hotel yang sama. Cerita punya cerita, atasan saya waktu dia check in juga diberitahu bahwa kamar yang non smoking sudah out of reservation. Tapi karena dia bersikeras tidak mau pakai kamar merokok, akhirnya dia diberikan kamar non smooking. Lah ini ada apa ?  Katanya nggak ada tapi karena ngotot baru diberi sesuai pesanan ?  Di sini pegawai sudah saya anggap tidak jujur entah apapun itu alasannya. 
Kamar sangat bau rokok dan pengap. Pengalaman terburuk menginap saya di hotel bintang 3 ke atas. Selain itu kamar juga kurang kedap suara. Masih terdengar lumayan jelas suara dan langkah orang diluar kamar
Poin plus nya mungkin kolam renang nya lumayan besar walaupun letaknya terpisah dari bangunan hotel

Memiliki kawasan yang strategis dan kelengkapan fasilitas economic business hotel merupakan kelebihan hotel ini. Lokasinya pun mudah dijangkau dengan berbagai macam akses. Di depan hotelpun terdapat shelter busway dan taxi yang terus standby sehingga sangat membantu untuk bepergian. 
Servis para staff pun sangat ramah. Saya senang saat proses checkin, mereka menyapa dan membuat step-by-step nya terasa sangat simpel. Begitu pula saat saya breakfast di restaurant. Kenyamanan  dari senyuman staff, menu makanan pagi yang beragam dan suasana ruang makan yang sejuk membuat masa tinggal ini menjadi berkesan. 
Soon, will be back here. Thank you Ibis Jakarta Cawang.
title: Menikmati Momen di Ibis Jakarta Cawang

text: Hotel Ibis Cawang mempunyai lokasi yang sangat strategis, apalagi buat kita yang datang dari bandung, karena keluar dari Tol Halim, hanya dalam kurang dari 10 menit sudah sampai. Lobby tang luas dengan Lounge Ibis Kitchen bikin kita santai menunggu saat melakukan proses check in. Restaurant Ibis Kitchen melayani mulai dari breakfast sampai dinner dengan menu masakan yang bervariasi dan enak sekali. Fasilitas kolam renang outdoor berada di depan bangunan hotel, sangat nyaman sekali. Selain itu buat yang hobby spa, juga tersedia. Semua tipe kamar sama dengan perbedaan view saja. Kamar tidur dengan ukuran yang luas tersedia meja untuk bekerja dan sofa untuk bersantai. Fasilitas lain adalah Internet Corner yang bisa digunakan oleh pengunjung hotel yang membutuhkan. Wifi Free dengan kecepatan yang baik.

text: Interior hotel yang Simple Dan minimalist banget..... Untuk knyamanannya cukup.. Hanya saja kurang begitu kedap ruanganx... Masih terdengar kebisingan d kamar sebelah.....untuk menu breakfasts nya juga kurang bervariasi...
title: Simple

owner_response.text:
Dear Ennydan,

Sebelumnya kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan Anda selama tinggal bersama kami.

Interior hotel kami adalah minimalist, futuristic, compact, accomodating , warm and comfortable seperti yang telah diatur oleh Brand Standard untuk Hotel Ibis globally.

Walaupun terlihat simple akan tetapi sentuhan parquet dan kamar mandi design yang unique akan memberi suasana kamar yang chic dan mewah bila dibandingkan dengan hotel lain dikelasnya. 

Berkaitan dengan kekedapan suara, hotel kami sudah di design sedemikian rupa dengan menggunakan standard kekedapan suara standard Ibis untuk city hotel yang mengutamakan kesunyian dan ketenangan di dalam kamar. Akan tetapi hal ini tidak menutup kemungkinan adanya gangguan suara dari kamar sebelah bila suara tersebut sangat keras sekali.

Kami juga sedang melakukan penyegaran variasi menu breakfast dengan memasukan masakan masakan lokal yang unik dan rasa yang lezat dari seluruh nusantara. 

Variasi masakan breakfast ini akan segera hadir di restaurant kami untuk melengkapi dan memperbaiki kualitas makanan pagi di hotel Ibis Jakarta Cawang.

Kami berharap Anda memberi kesempatan pada kami untuk membuktikan bahwa pelayanan, makanan dan fasilitas kamar kami sudah diperbaiki dan menjadi jauh lebih baik dari sebelumnya.

Sekali lagi terima kasih atas umpan balik Anda dan kami menunggu kedatangan Anda di Hotel Ibis Jakarta Cawang dalm waktu yang dekat.

Hormat kami,

Eksi Ayuningtyas
General Manager

text:
Saya tinggal selama tiga hari di hotel Ibis Jakarta, pada awalnya saya agak takut kalau service di hotel tidak baik karena banyak ulasan buruk mengenai hotel ini.

Akan tetapi yang saya alami sangat berbeda dengan ulasan-ulasan yang ada di tripadvisor ini. Saya sangat terkejut sekali karena pada saat saya check in saya langsung dibantu oleh seorang staff receptionist yang sangat ramah. kalau tidak salah namanya Laras, dia yang membantu saya untuk check in dan memberi saya welcome drink juga.

Benar-benar service yang berbeda, setelah itu Laras menjelaskan tentang fasilitas hotel, breakfast dan apa yang saya perlu ketahui.

Kamarnya tidak luas tapi kurang lebih sama ukurannya dengan kamar hotel budget yang lain jadi saya tidak kecewa. Tapi kebersihannya kamar saya luar biasa....saya tidak pernah tinggal di kamar sebersih itu di hotel budget yang lainnya di Jakarta.

Sudah pasti saya akan merekomendasikan hotel ini ke semua kawan-kawan saya. Maju terus Ibis Jakarta Cawang, terimakasih atas pelayanannya yang luar biasa sehingga waktu singgah saya di jakarta jadi sangat produktif dan relaxing.

Oh yah, makan pagi di Ibis restaurannya sekarang sudah lebih enak dan bervariasi di banding dengan yang dulu.

text: Lokasinya berada di sebelah gedung BNN dan akses transportasi umum bisa menggunakan bis Transjkarta karena letaknya dekat dengan halte busway BNN. Ini adalah salah satu hotel Ibis belogo bantal merah yang cukup baru (kalau tidak salah hampir 2 tahun) dan saat ini sudah tersedia fasilitas kolam renang (2 kali sebelumnya saya menginap belum ada fasilitas tersebut). Kenapa saya bilang Fresh dan Terbaik, karena hotel baru ini memiliki kolam renang. Beberapa Ibis lama yang memiliki kolam renang kondisinya hanya redekorasi, sedangkan Ibis baru lainnya saya rasa tidak memiliki fasilitas kolam renang jadi tetap Ibis Cawang terbaik di Jakarta. Staffnya cukup ramah apalagi yang menarik di kamar saya disediakan komplimen buah-buahan segar. Restorannya sama mengikuti standar Ibis berlogo bantal merah yang lain (umumnya di setiap Ibis berlogo bantal merah makanan tidak terlalu banyak variannya).

text:
Saya memilih hotel Ibis Cawang karena letaknya dekat dengan Halim Perdanakusuma Airport, hanya 10 menit naik mobil. Lokasinya strategis dan aksesnya sangat mudah ke bebrapa daerah penting seperti SCBD dan Bekasi.
Kamar minimalis tetapi sangat nyaman dengan kasurnya yang lain daripada yang biasa saya temui di hotel-hotel lainnya. Wifi bisa diakses dimanapun dan GRATIS.
Sarapan juga sangat tidak mengecewakan dengan menu yang buanyaak sekali pilihannya. More than my expectation. Mereka menyediakan local food dan juga international food untuk sarapan. Yang menarik mereka memiliki Healty Corner (many choise of salad) and Bread Corner dengan dekorasi yang unik. Mini pastry nya juara.
Lahan parkir sangat luas dan di depan hotel nampak sedang dibangun Swimming Pool besar. Didepan swimming pool yang sedang dibangun juga terdapat Ballroom besar.Staff juga sangat ramah.
For sure I will be back to this hotel.
title: Hotel Minimalis dengan Pelayanan Maksimal

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini selama 3 hari dua malam. Hotel ini memang masih baru, ketika itu kolam renang baru mulai dibuka esok hari. Hotel cukup bersih, interior lobby menyenangkan dengan warna2 fresh, petugas juga sangat ramah. Hal yang ingin saya kritik adalah kamar mandi terlalu sempit, mungkin karena sudah berupa "cetakan jadi tinggal pasang" maksudnya kamar mandi bukan dibangun/terbuat dari tembok. Akibatnya untuk orang berbadan besar sepoerti saya masuk ke dalam kamar mandi sangat pas-pasan tidak dapat bergerak bebas. Bahkan untuk handukan saja sampai keluar kamar mandi.
Ciri khas IBIS adalah adanya bantal dan guling yang besar, dan kita dapat tidur dengan nyaman "menenggelamkan" kepala kita

text:
Hotel baru ini terletak sangat dekat dengan perhentian bus trans jakarta, jadi jika anda berencana untuk mengitari jakarta tanpa mengalami keramaian dan hiruk pikuk mengemudi sendiri, anda dapat memarkir mobil anda dan naik bus Trans Jakarta atau transportasi umum pilihan anda. Dari bandara halim hotel ini cukup dekat, tapi anda harus membuat memutar balik melalui daerah yang cukup terkenal rawan di jakarta Timur dan tidak langsung melalui fly-over/jembatan Cawang.

Saya suka ukuran kamarnya, tidak terlalu besar jika anda harus menghabiskan malam oleh diri, tapi masih nyaman untuk pasangan dengan seorang anak. Mebel di dalam kamar sendiri dirancang dengan baik dan penuh pertimbangan, sehingga tidak ada ruang negatif.

Tapi yang paling saya suka adalah sarapan. Kue-kue yang lezat (croissant polos, cokelat roll dan dan rol dengan kayu manis) tersedia dengan pemanggang roti untuk memanaskan mereka di dekatnya. Mereka bahkan memanggang langsung croissant di ruang makan (menggunakan oven besar tentu saja), sehingga anda dapat mencium aroma surgawi sementara anda makan di sana. mereka membuat campuran sendiri yoghurt untuk salad dengan rasa gurih manis yang sangat jempol. Dan bukannya hanya menyediakan kopi dan teh, mereka juga menyediakan mesin kopi modern yang dapat membuat cappuccino yang lebih dari layak.

Staf hotel sangat membantu, sopan dan informatif. Mereka benar-benar menjadi kompensasi yang baik untuk lingkungan luar hotel yang masih kosong dan sedang dalamkonstruksi.
title: Tempat yang bagus untuk sarapan

text:
In many ways it was a classical Ibis Hotel, it was, in the main, what I expected. A well lit hotel room with adequate facilities, at a reasonable price. The reasons I choose to stay.

It was the differences from the classical Ibis that surprised me. The ‘Ibis Kitchen’ Restaurant was for me the original, the first, the only BYOK Restaurant I have been in; ‘BYOK’ stands for Bring Your Own Knife. Whilst Indonesian food may suit the use of fingers or a spoon and a fork, bread rolls and butter (and similar) are best when a knife is used. Buttering toast, or cutting a Danish pastry at breakfast should not have to be accomplished with a Desert Spoon. Yes, I did request a knife from the staff at breakfast but the wait…eight (8)minutes…is too long.

The restaurant staff were young, pleasant and enthusiastic, but poorly trained and apparently without the support of appropriate procedures.

Another crazy difference is the Car Park. There is no charging ‘grace time’ for taxis to come in and collect or drop off. So, use a taxi and you will get a car parking bill. On my first occasion it was IDR 4000 for 1 minute and 42 seconds in the car park. How silly and annoying.

Will I return…well I am still thinking about it. The Hotel is what I expect from an Ibis with some additional, unwelcome, annoyances.
title: A Classical Ibis Hotel but with additional annoyances

I would like to reiterate our commitment to high quality standards, and I personally would like to make sure you will experience it during your next stay with us.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again at Ibis. Please do not hesitate to contact me during your next visit.

text:
I booked this hotel from accorhotels.com, not take a long time the hotel staff will call me to make sure about my reservation. I think it's quite responsive enough for the reservation. For the location itself it’s really strategic not far from Halim Perdana Kusuma Airport. Beside that you can find this hotel easily cause located in main road Jl. Letjen M.T. Haryono. 

Room quality for me is the best as you can see in my photo that I take they have a lot of things like mini bar, mini refrigerator, hangers, safety box, international television channel, etc. Even you can find a pillow in your bed it’s quite unique because not all hotels provided. For the bathroom provided coll and hot water, quite clean enough even  they provide toiletries and hairdryer.

Goes to food I will give 9 from 10, because all the food that been provided by this hotel  is delicious. My favourite menu is Nasi Goreng Special. For dinner and breakfast ibis will provide buffet in their restaurant . Price for the food balanced with the taste very affordable.

Overall I will give 9 point from 10.
title: Luxury Hotel for Business

text:
My first time staying in this hotel. 

I like the lobby which I consider stylish, in line with the "young and casual" brand image that IBIS wants to build.

The room is far from being spacious, but it is really okay, especially if you just have a short stay. The bathroom also looks like a bathroom in the airplane with very limited space. After shower, you have to do the rest (wearing clothes, using body cream, etc.) in the room. However, the bathing experience is really good, as the shower works well and comfortable water flow. Amneties in the bathroom is complete, the room provides hairdryer as well. 

Room amneties are complete - the room has hangers, some space to put clothes, free coffee and tea, and even sofa to put your suitases or to sit. What I really love from the room is, bolster is provided

Brightness in the room is okay. However, there are many light switches which can confuse us which light we can turn off/on using which switches. 

Location-wise, it is strategic, near to Halim Perdanakusuma airport and direct access to the main street.

For budget hotel, it is more than okay 

In the future, I will definitely staying in IBIS Jakarta Cawang.
title: Practical, Economical, Good Location

Free mineral water, coffee, and tea

text:
Stayed here for one night in double bed room. 
The double bed size is smaller than standard queen size bed (less than 160 cm width). 
The room is clean, with safe deposit box, and mini refrigerator. 
The bathroom is a capsuled fiberglass. Quite innovative, maybe replicating Japanese fiberglass bathroom without the bath. 
All menu in the kitchen restaurant can be ordered as room service. However the room brochure did not shown all the kitchen restaurant menu. The food tasted quite good.
We waited for about 30 minutes for the food to delivered to the room. Fried rice, Soto Ayam, Fried Banana and Assorted Fruit, all quite tasty. 

The hotel is quite stingy, they only give 1 key, did not give 2 keys for each room, as other hotels usually do.  When I asked for another key, they said they will require a guarantee. And that is after I fully paid the room(s). I booked two rooms and paid both room upfront. I don't understand why they need guarantee after I paid for the room. 
And they also did not give me the payment receipt. They said they will give it to me when I checked out. Nope, they did not give me the receipt when/ after I checked out.
Also available here is one ATM machine near reception
title: Clean and stingy hotel

text:
Ibis Hotel is always become my first chosen hotel. But to be honest that for Ibis Hotel Cawang is rather disappointed me. The room and bathroom was very very small. Is this an Ibis budget? Since the color of the logo is red. But the room and bathroom was clean enough and the staffs were friendly and helpful. Check-in and check-out were so fast. 

My other concern is about the breakfast. The food was very delicious, as usual. But there was a fly which alighted on food. I already warned the staff restaurant but he just took the food away and tomorrow I still found a fly on the food when breakfast. 

The location was far from anywhere, except from Halim Perdana Kusuma Airport. But it has ATM inside. No mini-mart around, so better you buy anything you needed before go back to hotel.
title: Ibis Budget?

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Vera V,

Thank you for your valuable feedback in Tripadvisor.

Ibis Jakarta Cawang is Red Ibis which has rooms that designed specifically with the size and standard of Red Ibis Worldwide, some Red Ibis perhaps has bigger room due it was built before year 2014.

Nowadays all Red Ibis has exactly the same size of rooms and designed of bathroom as per the Red Ibis worldwide standard.

However we also concern about the presence of the fly on our food during breakfast, we have taken necessary measures to ensure that all flies will be prevented to enter the hotel restaurant through adjustment of our air curtain in the lobby area.

We have confidence this action will eliminate the presence of flies inside the hotel area and thank you very much for compliment of fast service and delicious food in our hotel. Actually we have hired the new Executive Chef who has a vast culinary experience in four and five stars hotel to provide the best variation food only for all of guest in Ibis Jakarta Cawang.

Regarding the mini market actually it is only 5 minutes travel away by Bussway which the Bussway station is only a 2 minutes walk from our hotel entrance and  you may reach a complete and modern Carrefour Supermarket where you can find everything that you need. This Carrefour is very close to hotel location, that is why our hotel location is very strategic due close to bussway station, carrefour supermarket, toll access and Halim Airport.

We also provide ATM machine at the lobby's hotel and if you are really busy and does not have time to travel to the closest Carrefour then you may ask one of our staff to assist you and to buy items that you need as per your preference.

Once again thank you very much for your valuable feedback and we are looking forward to welcome you again in the near future.

Sincerely,

Eksi Ayuningtyas
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This hotel is located at a super busy road especially in the morning and the evening. The cons about the location of this hotel are it can not be directly accessed from Airport towards MT Haryono Street, since you need to make a u-turn in UKI area and also if you are going to the airport you need to make a u-turn in Otista Street towards Halim Airport. do not expect that you'll be there soon since the traffic will be overwhelming and super packed. 

aside from the location, the hotel itself is quite good. The price is a bit overpriced for a standard hotel. The room is fairly decent, not big and not small. The bed is nice and comfortable. The bathroom is placed within the room, not separated. The AC and bathroom were working fine, no problem at all. There is a couch and a working space inside the room which is convenient enough for me. There is a coffee-and-tea set on the top of the fridge. The fridge itself was empty. 

I tried the room service and it was good. I tried nasi goreng which came with a good potion and adequate condiments yet the taste was surprisingly good. The lychee tea was tasted like a regular lychee ice tea. 

The hotel has a swimming pool which is oddly placed in the centre of the hotel/warehouses area. The swimming pool is surrounded by parking space and it was empty at the time I stayed there. 

For those who are wondering, the hotel is located inside the warehouses area. 

Overall, this is a good/decent hotel for those who need/have to layover in East Jakarta/Halim area nearby in particular.
title: A bit overpriced

text:
My first mistake was to make 2 separate bookings since I decided I would need an extra night. So basically it was a 2+1 night booking.

When I first checked in, I explained my situation to the frontdesk and he said it would be alright and he'll merge the two bookings together. 

On the final day, a lady from the frontdesk called my room and asked me to go to the frontdesk if I want to extend my stay.. I was sleeping when she called so I tried to explain but she sounded unhappy and raised her voice at me before saying thank you and hanging up the phone immediately without waiting for a brief moment for me to say anything.. Anyone would know that was simply rude! 

An hour after that rude call I received, I called room service to order some food from the extremely limited menu. I waited for almost an hour before the food reached my room.. I thought oh well maybe there's too many orders and let it go until I was told to make payment using cash! 

I'm an Accor hotel member and have been to other Accor hotels but this is the first time I'm asked to make payment using cash for room service! 
 
The girl who went up to serve my food seemed like she had no idea and called front desk to confirm.. And still insisted that I make payment using cash! 

So why was there a deposit in the first place when there was nothing in the minibar even.. I'm sure the deposit won't be enough to cover for damages to the room apart from room service! 

The room was quite spacious for a budget hotel. Oh and there were 2 tiny flies in the room! Yea I can count! It was annoying but at least it wasn't much of an issue. 
The location wasn't the best but this is the only hotel from the Accor group that is the nearest to my client's office. The food wasn't that bad though the spread is limited since it's a budget hotel. But in all fairness, I would rate the wifi excellent! One of the best in all the hotels I've stayed! That includes top 5 star hotels! Even wifi at Hyatt Jakarta was crappy!
title: Bad front desk service

Room was quite nice, and the amenities and equipments were complete. Bathroom and hot water were great. However, one thing which bothered me was the room which was smelled tobacco every time I entered there (I stayed at 10th floor in the corner room facing to the airport view), despite I already asked for non-smoking room. Breakfast was delicious with varied menus you can choose differently by days. You will have no doubt for food in this hotel. Although I had not tried the swimming pool yet because it did not provide child swimming pool, I believed that the pool was considered OK.

text:
I stayed here 3x during December month. The first on the 6th floor which was good. The hotel is really standard. Nothing to really stands out but most of the staff did their job right. 2nd time I stayed on 5th floor. Their smoking rooms are on higher floor, so I try to avoid them. Lower floor worked great for someone with cigarette allergy and bad asthma like me. The bathroom is not pleasant, always leave the floor flooded somehow. Bring your own toiletries, but for the price, the location, the hotel is great. 
The 3rd stay I had an unpleasant experience. during check-in at the reception, I asked for 6th floor again, the guy behind the counter named Reza told me the lower floor is under maintenance and won't be open for public. Bummer. I asked for how long, he looked at my data, and said 3Nights, exactly same time as my reservation since he also mentioned they just started that day. So, reluctantly I was given a room on 9th floor, He said the smoking room started from 11 or 12th floor. I said I don't know how I survive. But he just kept saying the 6th floor is not for sale. 
Upon arriving in the room, I can smell it. It stinks of cigarette, I have been in far too many hotels where either the floor is very near to smoking floor or people just smoke in the room and the smell stays. permeated the whole room and floor itself. I spent an hour trying to convince myself I would be fine, but I wasn't. I started not be able to breathe properly. And I called the housekeeping, which then came with Stella airfreshener to spray all over the room. I stopped her, telling her masking the cigarette smell with air freshener will only triggered my asthma. She promised to call her manager. Sandi came and showed me 4 different rooms on the same floor. all stinks, which he agreed. I told him that I had a history of anaphylactic shock from my allergy and I would prefer they give my money back and check-out if they can't give me room with no cigarette smell. I asked about 6th floor, and surprise, he told me the maintenance was turning off the aircon and water after midnight for 6 hours. so that's why the floor is off limit. I asked for how long, he said only that night. Two different stories. I then asked him, if he can just give me the 6th floor, by midnight I would be fast asleep. I won't know the aircon is off, I might sweat but I would be able to breathe. He agreed, and another surprise, there was another guest next to mine. On supposed to be closed floor. I stayed that night peacefully, didn't even know the aircon was off at midnight and the next 2 nights was also fine. 6th floor was indeed best for non smoking allergic people.
Upon checked out I met Reza again. I told him I was not impressed that he lied to me, saying the maintenance was for 3 days and that the room was completely sealed off. He was defensive saying that there was old guests who refused to move out, and the maintenance supposed to be for 3 days. No apologies, nothing but became really irritated with me and just belligerent. Please don't act like that towards your guest next time!
Other than that I still like the hotel, I probably will stay again in the future, but if I meet Reza again, I will wait for another reception to open. I am not interested of such character.
title: No frills, get the job done. For non smoker, get lower floor

text:
The hotel condition is fine, rooms are not so big (but enough) with minimalist design. The downside is the tube-bathroom…I really hate it. Too small and the material (it’s made from resin I guess) somehow doesn’t make me comfortable. Also the shampoo and conditioner dispenser needs to be pushed quote hardly. Staffs are friendly.

BUT the SOP for pandemics situation is quite loose. When I checked-in, other guest come to the the desk (from other side) not wearing the mask properly (he used it ON THE CHIN). Tried to remind him, he didn’t care. I was disappointed that the reception didn’t anything and still served him as if it very commonly happens. Also found guests smoking and chatting (of course no mask on) at the outdoor restaurant with no social distancing (I can tell they weren’t families).

So in conclusion: hotel is fine, strategic location and worth the price yet if u worry abt covid19, don’t stay here.
title: Nice but….

if you want to long stay here, its very recommended. Because the price is cheap and youve got full facilities in here (ex: swimming pool & gym)

text:
Stayed for 1 night special attending friend’s wedding near halim perdana kusuma and bulog building.
Chose this hotel cause my friend told me that his venue near from Ibis.
Too many people there so taken more times to check in. I requested double bed non smoking room, but the reception said i must waited until rooms ready. She told, there’s one room with non smoking room and twin bed. Caused i brought a baby, so i accepted and locked me in!
The room was clean, smell good, nice view.
Overall so good, and i love their staff so much, very helpful reception, warmful housekeeping when i met them. Waiters and chef are full of smiley on their face. And security guard who helps to bring my baggage and also my baby’s bag!
So happy to stay there. Thank you Ibis Jakarta Sentral Cawang!
Sorry forgot to capture the place, only capture this moment.
title: Nice place with warmful staff

text:
We stayed at ibis cawang two weeks ago

Just a short getaway, within short drive from our home

We enter the lobby, simple but feels warm, with smiling staffs

Check in process went smooth

We go to our room #825

It is relatively enough size for us

But amazingly comforting

The aircon, the bed, linen all very  cozy

Bathroom simple but clean and well equipped

The room has a view to the pool and city streets on a distance

To notice, we got welcome fruits, it was a nice touch

All in all, room meet our expectations

The pool, it's too bad, just for big kids and adults, little kids like mine, just can only soak their feet
But that's okay, my kids still have fun splashing around

Pool attendant very nice, pool very clean

Breakfast, spread out, many choices

All round up to a satisfying stay at ibis Jakarta cawang

In an affordable rate

Thank you Ibis Cawang

Will be back to stay and pick up my kids bottle 😊😊

text: My husband and I stayed here along with his whole family because it was the only hotel close to an event we were attending. At $50 USD/night, we weren't expecting much! But the Ibis had everything we needed. The rooms are quite small-- I've never seen a hotel room that small in the US-- but neat, clean, and modern. Compared to a budget hotel in the US, the Ibis is way higher quality. The breakfast is great and the restaurant for dinner was fine. We were the only Westerners in the hotel, but we didn't get any unwanted attention. And the staff and guests were very tolerant of my 6-year-old nephew running around!
title: Awesome Quality for the Price!

text: 센트럴에선 거리가 좀 있고요 전 남부에 일이있어서 여기로 잡았습니다. 고속도로 타기엔 가까운 위치같더라고요. 스탭들은 정말 친절했기에 별 다섯개. 조식은 맛없지만 이정도 레벨 호텔은 다 비슷한거 같구요. 풀은 어린이풀없고 1.4M짜리 하나 있으니 참고하세요. 방은 나쁘지 않았으나 제가 다시는 이용하지 않을 것 같은 이유는 화장실. 무거운 문이 연 채로 고정할수없게 자동으로 계속 닫히고요, 내부가 정말 좁습니다. 샤워부스도 너무 좁아요. 그리고 세탁 서비스 시킬때 검게 묻은 얼룩이 있으니 지워달라 부탁했는데 다 지워지지 않은 채로 왔고 리셉션에 얘기했더니 관련된 사람 불러드릴까요? 했으나 이미 전 체크아웃해야 하는 상황이라 그냥 왔습니다. 3일묵었는데 첫날맡기고 마지막 날찾았고, 안지워지면 안지워진다 뭐 요금을 덜받을까 어떡할까 저한테 연락해야했던게 아닌가 싶더군요. 마사지 서비스가 있는데 따로 정해진 장소가 없고 방에서만 가능합니다. 스파베드가 아니라서 목아파요. 아무튼 cawang점은 다시 묵지 않을 것 같습니다. 아침에 준비할때 화장실 문 열어둔채로 계속 왔다갔다 하면서 손씻고 준비하는 저한텐..
title: 화장실이 너~~무 좁고 불편함..

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr Kim F,

Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at the ibis Jakarta Cawang. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.

Our bathroom size is the new standard for the red Ibis globally and we do apologize if you are having inconvenience due our bathroom size.

As our service recovery we would like to offer you complimentary buffet lunch or Dinner for your future stay.

We appreciate your sharing your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Sincerely,

Eksi Ayuningtyas
General Manager
